name: PUG The Dog (PUG)
description: PUG is not the usual Dog. A blockchain-based game where your pets live  a second life in an infinite canine paradise! You can coin your dog's NFT and give it a second life in Pug's Paradise. Once in Pug your pet will be immortal, thanks to the blockchain no one will be able to change the data it will be forever in Pug0s paradise. We are working on creating game mechanics where you can feed your pet, socialize with other animals, play challenges together, and teach them basic commands. Pug is for those who love dogs!
